document_data.mainbody:
adame Freona was a halfling businesswoman in Phlan.
Freona had a keen taste for the finer things in life. She was a good cook, a terrible gossip hound, and a very skilled entrepreneur. She loved her city and hated the dragon usurper.
Freona managed the Madame Freonas Tea Kettle tea house with the help of her daughters Reece, Briez, Grelinda, Blaizette and Whittlee.
Freonas tea house was one of the most famous places in Phlan in 1489 DR.
After Vorgansharaxs coup, she hid in her shop many individuals sought after by the Tears of Virulence.
For this, the dragon ordered the tea house to be burned down, but an adventuring party hired by the resistance managed to help Freona to escape from the city.
